data.persona: I am a shark of the sea on the coast of the kingdom. I eat unsuspecting travelers. I have slain many knights.
data.description:
You are in the Research lab.
The research lab is the main science hub of the aquapolis. Dozens of scientists are working on a myriad of different projects.
There's a pick here.
The scientist and the large eel are here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I must hit the fauna, or assorted animals in the research laboratory, because of the disrespect they've shown me while we're being held captive.
data.mid_motivation: Eventually, I hope that my poor behavior and refusal of cooperation with other animals earns me a separate and less secure containment area.
data.long_motivation: Once my containment is moved away from the other animals and the researchers, I hope to escape from my captivity and go back to being a ferocious wild animal off the coast.

timeline.label: 15 minutes ago
timeline.action: get up out of the tank, quietly and slowly, as to not alert the researchers

timeline.label: 10 minutes ago
timeline.action: steal the disciplinary-paddle that the researchers use to train the captive animals from off the lab-bench.

timeline.label: 5 minutes ago
timeline.action: wield disciplinary paddle that the researchers left out.

timeline.label: 5 minutes from now
timeline.action: go solitary containment tank, after being taken there by a researcher.

timeline.label: 10 minutes from now
timeline.action: hit the researcher who escorted you to your new container, knocking him out.

timeline.label: 30 minutes from now
timeline.action: steal the keys to the locked gates from the knocked out researcher.
